name: Infinity Basket
loreDescription: Now, put your most expensive possession in this basket - it doubles! Put in two? Quadruples! This isn't a scam, trust me!

skillDescription.base: Increases allies' chance of Dual Attack by 7.0% during the caster's turn. Dual Attack will deal 20% more damage.
skillDescription.max: Increases allies' chance of Dual Attack by 14.0% during the caster's turn. Dual Attack will deal 20% more damage.
